item.title: Last Canadian Grievances of a Scot 30-Apr-2014
item.description: Sometimes funny, sometimes serious, I summarise my 8 months spent in Vancouver in a traditionally critical way.
item.itunes:subtitle: A summary of things that have pissed me off over the year.

item.title: Pro-Life Movement and University Education 23-Apr-2014
item.description:
A breakdown of what the Pro-Life advocate and ways they could better spend their time consistent with some of their beliefs.
Then a closer look at what our universities are really for.
item.itunes:subtitle: A Suggestion to the Pro-Life Movement and Issues with the Education System

item.title: What is Government 16-Apr-2014
item.description: 1: What is Government? 2: What makes Governments see legitimate? 3: The Issues with Democracy and accountability 4: Revolution: What the Internet and Social Media are doing to challenge the Government.
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussion with PhD Candidate Serbulent Turan on the purpose and workings of government.
